EmailTemplate.description: Sent to Grant Administrator once Subrecipient submits required documents
EmailTemplate.name: Site Visit Subrecipient Documents Submitted
EmailTemplate.subject: Documents Submitted for Site Visit {!SiteVisit__c.SiteVisitName__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!SiteVisit__c.GrantAdministrator__c},
Documents have been submitted for Site Visit {!SiteVisit__c.SiteVisitName__c}; you are requested to review and approve the submissions.
Please do not reply to this email. You may contact the GovGrants Support Team at govgrants@support.com if you have any questions or need assistance with this task.
Sincerely,
EGMS Team
